name: Coffee Break
description:
Set aside your to-do list & make time to unwind with your loved ones over a fresh brew.

Our Coffee Break Gift Box comes with a Signature Coffee tin and a set of striking blue cappuccino cups. ARAKU Signature Coffee has an exquisite, bold character and an aromatic balance, ready to be enjoyed with family and friends.

You can specify your preferred grind size in the order note on the cart page
